summary: This is a mod with followers and NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
Oh boy.

Greetings !!
My name is ThexFoondom (A.K.A. Foon), and this is my first Skyrim mod ever. The name of the mod is, as it says above, Foon's Mod.

[b]But what is Foon's Mod?[/b] Well! I'm going to tell you my questioning little friend!
It's a mod. Which .. doesn't quite really have a description. It doesn't do anything special, it's nothing specific, it's just a mod.
I [i]would[/i] end my description here, but then I would not get alot of downloads now would I?
Currently, all this mod does is to add a few followers. But there'll be more (mixed) content. And standalone files. For example if the mod ever gets to the point where there are NPCs, items, buildings, etc. I will have standalone files incase you don't want ALL of it. Some of them might be required for another file to work though.
[size=4]
[b]Before you ask-questions:[/b][/size][b]
[/b]Q: Can you make an NPC that [insert suggestion here]
A: I don't know, probaly. As Alvor says: "By Ysmir, if it's [i][b]simple [/b][/i]and strong then I can forge it!".... I'm not that good of a modder just yet.

Q: My game crashes.
A: No idea. Mine doesn't. Put the mod up or down in the load order (In the launcher - it's data files). Maybe it's not even my mod.

Q: How to install?
A: Great question! I can answer this one! Put the files from the .zip file into your data folder which is located in ProgramFiles->Steam->SteamApps->Skyrim

Q: How to open the .zip file? ;-;
A: Download WinRAR or something similar.

Q: Help?
A: Ok.

Q: Can I make a video of this mod?
A: Yeh sure. But put a link in the description.. No-one likes non-linking videos.

Q: Why do the NPCs look glitched?
A: Because you messed up your installation.

Q: Are you out of before you ask-questions?
A: Yes.

Q: Hug?
A: Yes. ;-;
author: ThexFoondom
